article_title: Rock Lititz Studio holds grand-opening party Saturday
article_text: Tim Mekeel is the Lancaster Newspapers business editor. He can be reached at tmekeel@lnpnews.com or (717) 481-6030. You can also follow @tmekeel_lnpnews on Twitter.

article_metadata.author: TIM MEKEEL | Business Editor

og.description: There’s no way a place as unique, hip and grand as Rock Lititz Studio would have a boring, dinky grand opening.
og.title: Rock Lititz Studio holds grand-opening party Saturday
